Jentrata About

Open Source Integration Open Source Commercial Support of Jentrata

Jentrata’s Company Profile

Jentrata is a technical service and support company focused on the integration of enterprises and helping companies accelerate their time to market. Jentrata offers commercial support subscriptions, enterprise consultation and added value software for solutions surrounding the Jentrata open source software.

Jentrata’s employees are outstanding innovators with years of experience in integration and protocols.

Jentrata’s Values

We value stability over size, quality over quantity, and honesty over sales pitches. We don’t over-promise, or under-deliver. What we do is provide unparalleled support, along with results that deliver.

We are also highly committed to the spirit of open-source software. After all, Jentrata is the company behind the Jentrata open source solution available through Jentrata.org, which in itself is an open source endeavour. We give back to the Jentrata community by donating our time and code, and releasing our improvements and bug fixes to the public.
